title: How to Find Instinct V2 (Observation Haki v2) in Blox Fruits

steps.title: You need to have all of these checkmarked before you can upgrade to Instinct V2.
steps.content: You need to have all of these checkmarked before you can upgrade to Instinct V2. Be level 1,800 or higher. Have 5,000 exp on Instinct V1. Once you get Observation or Instinct V1 , you need to gain experience in it by using it. Talk to the Instinct Teacher in Upper Skylands to see your current amount of experience. If you have the "Ultra Instinct" title, you have at least 5,000 exp in V1. You can quickly get 5,000 exp by using all your dodges, going to First Sea to recharge your dodges, and then repeating the process. Have the Musketeer Hat. You have to complete the Citizen's Quest to get the Musketeer Hat. Have $5,000,000. The skill upgrade costs $5,000,000 to obtain. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Talk to the Hungry Man in a pineapple house in Floating Turtle.
steps.content: Talk to the Hungry Man in a pineapple house in Floating Turtle. If you don't meet the requirements, Hungry Man will say, "Go away, weakling" instead of offering a quest.

steps.title: Find the 3 fruits.
steps.content: Find the 3 fruits. The Hungry Man will tell you to find these foods for him: Apple: Top of a hill next to Hungry Man (You can use the Portal Fruit to go to "Turtle Mountain" to get to the top of the hill easily.) Banana: At the Great Tree on Hydra Island, in the Third Sea. Pineapple: At Port Town, near the Pistol Billionaires, inside a stall in the left corner. These fruits will spawn every 10 minutes.

steps.title: Talk to the Citizen to put the fruit in a bowl.
steps.content: Talk to the Citizen to put the fruit in a bowl. You can find this NPC near the Third Sea Mansion on the Floating Turtle. You need the Musketeer Hat to speak with the Citizen. You can grab it quickly and easily by breaking a wall in front of the entrance to the Mansion behind 3 mushrooms. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Give the Hungry Man the fruit bowl.
steps.content: Give the Hungry Man the fruit bowl. If you skip talking to the Citizen, the Hungry Man will say, "Nice, you found three fruits, but I'm a picky person. I want to eat this in a bowl, can you do that for me?" Once you give him the fruit bowl, you can buy Instinct V2 for $5,000,000. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Upgrading to V2 opens these abilities.
steps.content: Upgrading to V2 opens these abilities. You can see another player's: Level, Fighting Style, Sword, Blox Fruit, Gun You will only see equipped items. Recharge dodges faster. Larger detection range. Less blurred vision and higher brightness. In combat, +50% speed boost. See when another player is charging up or holding a move.
